abstract: Forge a foreclosure, get a gift; Steve Job’s Google rant; the great private equity shake-out.
snippet: Forge a foreclosure, get a gift; Steve Job’s Google rant; the great private equity shake-out.
lead_paragraph: –Following Angelo R. Mozilo’s settlement with the Securities and Exchange Commission, David Weidner wrote for MarketWatch that “regulators can look back on a decade where the biggest crook they outed and put behind bars was Martha Stewart.”
